<small>Aramaic form: [[H5256]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסַח‎</span>] **verb** ==pull or tear away== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסַח‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְסַח‎</span> both ***remove***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nasâ—u***</u></abbr> = Biblical Hebrew, so Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נסח‎</span> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>82</sup> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>323</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***annul, supersede, change by substitution, copy***; compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nis—u, nus—u***</u></abbr>, ***extract***, ***excerpt*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 472</sup> [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>ZA iv (1889), 267</sup>; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסְחָה‎</span>, Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נסחת‎</span> ***id.***, also Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נוסחא‎</span> (whence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]]<sup>ZMG xxxii. 760</sup> compare [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>251</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***copy***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּית גֵּאִים יִסַּח י‎</span> [[Prov.15.25|Prov 15:25]] ***the house of proud men will*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***tear down***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיִסָּֽחֲךָ מֵאֹהֶל‎</span> [[Ps.52.7|Ps 52:7]] ***yea, he*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***shall tear thee away, without a tent***; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְּחוּ מִן‎</span> [[Prov.2.22|Prov 2:22]] transgressors ***shall*** (men) ***tear away from*** the land (read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָָּֽסְחוּ‎</span> ***shall be torn away***; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָּרֵ֑תוּ‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:144»§ 144</sup>, 3b. R [[BDB#Da|Da]]<sup>Synt. § 108. b</sup>). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִסַּחְתֶּם מֵעַל הָאֲדָמָה‎</span> [[Deut.28.63|Deut 28:63]] ***and ye shall be torn away from off the land.*** 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסָּח‎</span> [[2Kgs.11.6|2Kgs 11:6]], see above
